item.title: Agency Promo Video - Upwork
item.description:
We recently had a company photo shoot done at our office where we had a lot of b-roll video created. I'd like a super creative, talented videographer storyteller to the raw b-roll film and create a :30 and :60 promo video for our company.

We have a unique, tech-centered vibe and I have some music ideas that would be cool to play with. I think the final video could be a mix of the b-roll we have, some stock, and perhaps some images of our work.

item.title: Nature Content for TikTok, Reels, Shorts - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor to help us create engaging nature-focused content for TikTok. The content will be sourced from Zoom meetings, selfie videos, and voice notes provided by our team and contributors. Your role will be to edit this raw footage into polished, visually captivating videos that fit the look and feel of TikTok.

These videos will most just be talking about different animals and nature.

Video Requirements:
Length: Each final video should be between 1 to 4 minutes long, optimized for TikTok's vertical format.
Content: The videos will cover various nature-related topics, such as wildlife, landscapes, conservation efforts, and outdoor adventures.

Editing Tasks:
Editing: Remove filler words (e.g., "um," "uh") from the audio, tighten the pacing, and ensure smooth transitions between clips.
Visual Enhancement: Incorporate high-quality nature footage, photos, and graphics to complement the audio content.
Lower Third Integration: Keyframe the speaker's head and shoulders to place them in the lower third of the nature footage or photos.
Captions: Add captions or subtitles to improve accessibility and engagement.
Branding: Include our logo and any necessary branding elements in the videos.
Deliverables:
Edited video files in the required aspect ratio and resolution for the platforms.

Extra info:
We have some raw footage I recorded here that I would like to already use as a demo (https://drive.google.com/file/d/15XUPYmJDS3GX36wz0y00OQq0EjURl1tJ/view?usp=sharing).

We can take direction to record the videos differently but these are the types of video content you would receive.
We would like a price per video quote on these style of videos

Examples:
Example of video style we would like (https://www.tiktok.com/@mndiaye_97).

The background might just be an image, or multiple images or a video. We would discuss what was possible for each video. We would not want to license endless videos to keep costs down.

Please quote me what the cost per video would be in your application. Thank you!



Posted On: June 20, 2024 16:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer Needed for 1 Hour On Location Shoot in Toronto, July 16 - 1:00 pm - 2:00 pm, Etobicoke - Upwork
item.description:
One hour video shoot of a private business dinner event on July 16 from 1:00 pm - 2:00 pm at Via Allegro Ristorante, 1750 The Queensway, Etobicoke, ON M9C 5H5, Canada

-We are looking for a total of 20 short video clips of the event
-No editing needed just the raw footage
-These are candid shots of people enjoying a dinner party
-Gimbal or some stabilizer needed
-No audio needed
-No external lighting needed

Content Capture Shot List

1.Establishing shots of venue (for atmosphere)

2. POV walking into the venue (make it look like you are arriving to a swanky event, think allure)

3. POV walking into the private room (give the viewer a feeling of entering into a secret meeting)

4. People network with each other

Wide shots of the room with people interacting with each other to give viewer an overall idea of how many people are attending

People laughing and talking to one another. They should look happy and animated. people being expressive.

people being animated and conversing

We will be using the shots you take to put together a 30 sec overview of the event. Here’s an example of final edits we’ve done in the past:

NYC Think Tank Final Edited Video -https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7033886301854580736

Chicago Video Shoot
https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7179186756565553152/

NYC Think Tank
https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7186763059695140864/

Toronto Think Tank Final Edited Video
https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7048733036649070592/


Budget: $100
Posted On: June 20, 2024 15:56 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, People, Videography, Camera, Photography
Skills: Business, People, Videography, Camera, Photography
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Creative Podcast Producer - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a master of audio storytelling with a flair for social media magic, eager to be part of the creation of a new podcast? In this role, you’ll be the heartbeat of our podcast production, weaving compelling narratives and amplifying our voice across social media platforms.

Key Responsibilities:
- Podcast Production Extraordinaire:
Plan, support with scripting, record, edit, and publish captivating podcast episodes that resonate with our audience and are on brand.
- Content Collaborator:
Work hand-in-hand with our hosts and guests to create magnetic content that aligns with our mission and engages our listeners.
- Schedule Maestro:
Keep our podcast production on track, ensuring every episode is delivered on time with a high quality of standard.
- Sound Wizard: Edit audio to perfection, creating a seamless and immersive listening experience.
- Social Media Savant: Clip and craft short, engaging video snippets from podcast episodes for Instagram Reels and posts, turning our audio gold into social media treasures.
- Analytics Ninja: Monitor and analyze podcast performance metrics, using insights to continuously elevate our content.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Podcast Producer or similar role.
- Strong understanding of audio production techniques and software
- Excellent storytelling, writing.
- Strong organizational and time-management skills.
- Experience with video editing software for creating social media content
- Familiarity with social media platforms, particularly Instagram, and an understanding of how to create engaging content for them.
- Passion for podcasts and staying up-to-date with industry trends.
- Experience with promoting podcasts and growing an audience is a plus.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Communications, Journalism, Media Production, or a related field.
- Experience with remote recording tools.
- Familiarity with SEO and podcast marketing strategies.
- Basic knowledge of graphic design and social media management.

What We Offer:
- Flexible work hours and remote work opportunities.
- A vibrant, collaborative, and creative work environment.
- A chance to be part of a passionate team dedicated to creating impactful content.

If you’re a creative and detail-oriented Podcast Producer & Social Media Storyteller with a passion for audio storytelling, we’d love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, a cover letter, and links to your portfolio or samples of your work.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 20, 2024 15:52 UTC
Category: Audio Production
Skills:Audio Mastering, Podcast, Audio Production, Audio Editing, Audio Post Production, Podcast Production
Skills: Audio Mastering, Podcast, Audio Production, Audio Editing, Audio Post Production, Podcast Production
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for True Crime Bodycam Compilations - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled and creative video editor to work on a series of 20-30 minute videos in the true crime genre, specifically bodycam compilations. The ideal candidate should have a unique editing style that can captivate audiences and enhance the storytelling of each video. As a video editor, you will be responsible for choosing most engaging moments in a video whilst retaining important aspects of the storyline. If you have a passion for true crime and a knack for creating compelling visual narratives, we would love to hear from you. Regarding the budget, is negotiable depending on skillset and will increase if long term.

Skills Required:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
- Attention to detail
- Produce 1 video within a week
- Familiarity with the true crime genre

Please provide samples of previous video editing work showcasing your unique editing style.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 20, 2024 15:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Video Editor for Story Videos (Easy Editing) - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor for simple video editing.

I will provide a 7-9 minute voiceover, and your job is to match it with suitable stock footage from Storyblocks. Each stock footage clip should be 3-8 seconds long. For an 8-minute video, you will need to source approximately 90-100 different stock footage clips. (the stockfootage subscription is paid by me)

Skills required: Basic skills in Premiere Pro

My budget per video is $10, and we can establish a long-term contract after the first tests. For example, a 30-video contract so you have consistent work, eliminating the need to take on small jobs from multiple clients. Therefore, I believe $10 per video is fair.

I am looking for someone to work with long-term, and I would need one video per day. The rate per video and bonuses may increase in the future if my budget allows it.

Looking forward to working with you!

Hourly Range: $10.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 15:44 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, English
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, English
Country: CHE
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
``Duties:
- Edit video footage to create high-quality and engaging content
- Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and objectives
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film
- Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects
- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running of the final product
- Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry's best practices to maximize efficiency ```Requirements:```
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor or similar role - Proficient in using film editing software such as Adobe Premiere, Adobe After Effects, and Adobe Creative Suite
- Familiarity with other editing software like Adobe Bridge, Capture One, and Maya is a plus
- Solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages
- Strong understanding of post-production techniques including color grading, audio mixing, and typography
- Excellent attention to detail with a creative mind and storytelling skills
- Ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively with a team
- Strong time management skills to meet project deadlines If you are passionate about video editing and have the skills to bring stories to life through visual content, we would love to hear from you. Join our team of talented professionals and contribute to creating compelling videos that captivate audiences.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing

item.title: Head Of Production - Upwork
item.description:
*Hiring a Head Of Production*

We are hiring a head of editing department for our agency, SNP Enterprises, which is one of the top 3 biggest content agencies in the world.

You'll be working alongside on some of the top tier clients in the entrepreneurship, business space, and will be able to build a massive portfolio that can serve you for decades.

Some of our clients include: Russell Brunson, David Meltzer, MambaFx, Garrett White, and many others that you'll wanna have in your portfolio.

Requirements:

- We are hiring someone that is top 0,1% in the editing space, someone that is up with the trends, someone that edits like a beast, someone young, hungry, and confident that his edits are brutally good
- Someone that has leadership skills to train our editors to upscale to amazing top tier editing levels
- Experience in the editing space for 3+ years

Scope of work:

- You will be in charge of all editors in the team (15-20 at the moment)
- You will review every single clip that they do
- You will point out improvements, tweaks, and ways to make clips better
- You'll be in charge of following editing trends and following what performs the best
- You'll be in charge of finding assets, websites, and anything needed to take the team to the next level
- You will lead the editing weekly calls where you'll review videos, show them what can be done better
- You will review Loom videos that editors submit, to see if there's anything that can be done in a better or faster manner

YOU WILL NOT edit any videos yourself, this is not a video editor position, it is a leadership training position.

Compensation:

Structure starts of at $1,000 per month

A $500 bonus will be added if KPI's are met in terms of views for our clients.

How To Apply:

1. Send your top 10 edits that you've made
2. Send client names, links to their social media and their best performing videos you've edited
3. Send over a brief summary on why you think you're the right person for this position

Looking forward to it!

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 20, 2024 15:34 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Video, Video Editing, CapCut, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Video, Video Editing, CapCut, Social Media Marketing
Country: Serbia
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor to break up conference videos - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to help cut up long footage of a conference. Need an intro slide made with the persons face, name and session title, and then the appropriate cutting up of the footage all the way through the end of their session.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$45.00

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Footage-Based Video, Color Grading, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Talented AI Video Editor/Creator Wanted! - Upwork
item.description:
We're kicking off an exciting new crypto project and need a skilled AI video editor/creator to bring our vision to life with a high-quality promotional video with a high-fashion flair.

What You'll Do:
- Team up with our marketing and creative teams to understand project goals.
- Use AI-powered tools to create an eye-catching 2-3 minute promo video.
- Incorporate advanced editing techniques and AI-generated effects for a polished final product.
- Add visual effects, music, and graphics to enhance the video’s impact.
- Ensure the video clearly showcases our project’s unique value.

We look forward to hearing from you!


Ready to take on this exciting project? Show us your portfolio and let's create something amazing together!





Posted On: June 20, 2024 15:26 UTC
Category: AI Video Generation & Editing
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Stock Video for Medical Website Hero - Upwork
item.description:
I need a video for a website hero section. The company is focused on medical sales, so the stock footage will need to relay the brand message. I can provide examples once the freelancer is chosen. I'd like for this project to be completed before the end of the week. I think that the video will be around 10 clips.

Budget: $50

item.title: Instagram reel video editing - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone who can edit a simple Instagram Reel video from my draft footage.

The draft footage in this Dropbox contains 2 videos. They are 05:05 and 13:03 in length. I would like to combine both pieces of footage to create one video. This video will have two parts. The first part will comprise of the 05:05 footage, whilst the second part will comprise of 04:35 onwards of the 13:03 footage. The first part is supposed to portray our senior legal practitioner updating our viewers on the firm’s whereabouts, whilst the second part is supposed to portray a dialogue between one of our young legal practitioners and the same senior legal practitioner.

Attached in this Dropbox is an example video of how we would like this one to be edited.

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/zm7xi28j4qahdggt7m1bb/ALxLp8TRXZk1ARLwOxCszKA?rlkey=tym8eclngufj7m0f9icmqxryu&st=9kuk18ud&dl=0

The Brief:
- The footage should be combined and narrowed down to 1:30 minutes if possible, although it can be longer if that is more appropriate.
- Cropping of the original audio is encouraged (zooming in/zooming out etc.), as is any empty spaces where there is no dialogue/no relevant dialogue.
- Subtitles are a must. Dialogue should be displayed on screen in text format (please keep it the same format which you have used for our previous videos).
- Music, sound effects etc are also welcomed, provided they are not too distracting/overwhelming.
- This should be snappy, fun, and engaging to watch, and will be posted to Instagram Reels.

Intro/Outro:
- The file INTROCLIP.MP4 should be attached to the start of the video.
- The file OUTROCLIP.MP4 should be attached to the end of the video.

I would like to please ask for a quote for this work.


Posted On: June 20, 2024 15:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Transition, Video Cleanup, Video Editing
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Transition, Video Cleanup, Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
